title: GP Services Pricing
tagline: Transparent fees inspired by our legacy pricing page.
description: Understand your investment before booking—no surprise admin fees.

seo.metaTitle: Private GP Pricing London | Consultation & Screening Fees | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: View the cost of GP consultations, home visits, health screening, tests, and medical letters at our Marylebone practice.

hero.headline: Clarity Before You Book
hero.subheadline: We publish our most-requested fees and create bespoke quotes for complex cases.

overview.title: Guide Pricing
overview.content: Standard GP appointment (30 mins) from £250 • Extended appointment (60 mins) from £395 • Home or hotel visit from £495 • Health screening from £895 • Blood tests from £95 + lab fees • Medical letters from £65 • Visa/insurance forms from £120 • Corporate retainers available on request.
highlights: Corporate wellness days tailored to your office
Payment plans for larger diagnostic bundles

cards.title: Signature GP Membership
cards.description: Includes quarterly consultations, priority booking, and WhatsApp access.

faq.question: Do you accept insurance?
faq.answer: We provide invoices for reimbursement. Some insurers cover consultations and diagnostics—check with your provider.

faq.question: Are payment plans available?
faq.answer: Yes, we can stage payments for programmes over £1,000.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: 48 hours' notice is required; otherwise 50% of the fee is charged to protect clinical time.

cta.title: Request a Personalised Quote
cta.subtitle: Share your needs and we’ll send transparent pricing within hours.
